entry.title: Oscar Nominees Luncheon 2024: Best Looks and the ‘Anatomy of a Fall’ Dog
entry.summary: In a ballroom full of A-listers in Beverly Hills, the Border collie from “Anatomy of a Fall” had the stars lining up to meet him.

entry.title: These Grandmas Are Going to the Oscars
entry.summary: In the documentary short “Nǎi Nai and Wài Pó,” Sean Wang chronicles the inner lives of his grandmothers. Now, the film is nominated for an Academy Award.

entry.title: Jeffrey Wright on ‘American Fiction’
entry.summary: The veteran has played everything from an artist to a general to a professor, the role in “American Fiction” that finally landed him an Oscar nomination.

entry.title: Robert Downey Jr. and Christopher Nolan on ‘Oppenheimer.’
entry.summary: These Oscar nominees for “Oppenheimer” met years ago, but the director had no plans to cast this star then, noting, “I was also a little afraid of you.”

entry.title: Harmony Korine’s ‘Aggro Dr1ft’ Makes Los Angeles Debut
entry.summary: These Oscar nominees for “Oppenheimer” met years ago, but the director had no plans to cast this star then, noting, “I was also a little afraid of you.”
